attributes.review: I don’t like the purpose or cause of this app. I also don’t like the fact that I had to share personal information if I wanted to use the app anyways. I don’t feel comfortable using this app, I also don’t agree with any of the decisions that Donald J trump has made. So it’s explanatory why I left the review that I did. Please make sure to take this app down Apple.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: First of all, I am utterly disgusted by this app🤢🤢. I did not expect to open the app and see that this app records everything you do!! 🤬🤬 I am so disgusted that this man wants to see us as soon and we open the app😡😡. Then as soon as I try closing the app a man showed up to my door and asked me to vote for this oompa loompa looking man? 🤨 I cannot and will not be using this app ever again 🤮🤮.
attributes.title: I hate this app!!😡
attributes.userName: Djs sir send she been fbd

attributes.review: I first got the app to know about bunker boys rallies near me (so i could get my tickets & then accidentally miss the rally ofc) but the app literally took over my phone and it started shooting Chinese lasers at me!!!!!! 😡😡😡😡 it then hyjacked my fridge and my microwave. then a stupid liberal CNN news came on and started talking about the BLM matter protest. I never want to see any of that rubbish again 🤬🤢
attributes.title: absolutely awful

attributes.review: when I opened the app the first thing that popped up was a cheeto or an orange🍊🍊 could’ve been both but I couldn’t see well because I got blinded by the ugliness of it✨ummm chile...anyways once I opened it, it started glitching and then after that the orange, cheeto thing popped up again and it was a photo of him spray tanning🙈🙉🙊 so I 100% do not recommend this cheeto, orange app💕✨😌🦋🐳
attributes.title: oh to see without my eyes —👄—

attributes.review: i downloaded the app with all good intentions, all was well until today when i opened it. i saw the most horrific thing ever. there it was...a picture of bunker boy fully nude🤢 me and my little brother are traumatized and now have to go to therapy. recovery will take a long time, i am now afraid of the color orange. if i see anything orange my body just freezes. DONT GET THE APP 0/5
attributes.title: worst app ever🤮

attributes.review: I got this app to support the smexy racist rapist cheeto man himself! As soon as i clicked the download button a cheeto bag appeared in front of my face telling me “Trump 2020” I thought i was dreaming but no! When i opened the cheeto bag tiny mini trumps came out! I had to get away from the mini trumps so i ran to the bathroom and saw a horrifying sight. My face turned ORANGE!!! I would not recommend this app unless you wanna look like this 🍊👄🍊
attributes.title: ORANGE MESS!

attributes.review: As you may know if you have already downloaded this app it is necessary to give your cell  number to make an account, i did so and suddenly began receiving messages from member I am not familiar with. This only occurred after getting this application, I believe that my information was shared and as the blue haired libs say, my body my choice I did not consent to this
attributes.title: Horrific

attributes.review:
SpongeBob: Talk to me, Krabs. 
Mr. Krabs: Oh. It started out as a simple order: a Krabby Patty with cheese. When the customer took a bite, no cheese! [he cries, but SpongeBob slaps him]
SpongeBob: Get a hold of yourself, Eugene. I'm going in. [SpongeBob walks in and sees a fish, extremely nervous, looking at his Krabby Patty.]Take it easy, friend. I'm the manager of this establishment. [He puts a briefcase down on a table.] Everything's gonna be just fine. 
Phil: I'm really scared here, man.
attributes.title: Worlds Worst App

attributes.review: as soon as i downloaded the app, it made me verify that i was an american citizen. after that, i had to type in my name, so obviously i did! the second after that, it banned me because it said my name was too “ethnic” and it didn’t fit the american ideals. i tried to send an email for support, but they said that since my dad’s an immigrant, they’ll be forced to ban my family permanently. i tried to reach out once more, but they then proceeded to threaten my grandma, and the next day she was dead! so upset. proud american turned raging liberal. i’d rate this 0 stars if i could but anything to bring down cheeto man helps.
attributes.title: donald trump killed my grandma!

attributes.review: The app is very glitchy, it is also laggy. Do not recommend. It also blows up your phone with notifications. If you want your phone to be blowing up with random non-important messages then DON’T DOWNLOAD THIS APP! To add on, it also makes you have your locations turned on, so they can see where you are at. Very disappointed with this app. Smh 🤦‍♀️
attributes.title: THIS APP IS A NO GO!!!🤢🤮
